function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lockdowns and social distancing impacting construction companies","Impact":"Financial difficulties, delays, and new regulations","Mitigation":"Maintaining good terms with suppliers, ensuring safety of construction teams","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Construction companies","Owner":"Construction companies"},{"Description":"Potential bankruptcy for engineering and construction companies","Impact":"Financial strain and inability to acquire funding","Mitigation":"Seeking funding, streamlining debt","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Engineering and construction companies","Owner":"Engineering and construction companies"},{"Description":"Increase in demand for homes with dedicated office spaces due to remote work","Impact":"More housing demand, need for dedicated workspaces","Mitigation":"Encouraging remote work, providing options for dedicated workspaces","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Homebuyers, employees working remotely","Owner":"Employers, real estate developers"}]}
